member.name: T:UtilityPack.Print.Print
member.summary: Class with static functions for printing in console or gui with different colors based on the type of function used

member.name: F:UtilityPack.Print.Print.IsGUI
member.summary:
If true, the messages will not be written to the console but to gui through the function
(Default false)

member.name: F:UtilityPack.Print.Print.IsActive
member.summary:
If false, no messages will be written when the printing functions are called
(Default true)

member.name: F:UtilityPack.Print.Print.IsVerbose
member.summary:
If false, no verbose message will be written when the printing functions are called
(Default false)

member.name: F:UtilityPack.Print.Print.IsDebug
member.summary:
If false, no debugging messages will be written when the function or is called
(Default false)

member.name: F:UtilityPack.Print.Print.GuiWriteFunction
member.summary: Function called when writing to gui instead of console

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.Message(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Write a plain WHITE message.
If 'line' is true go to new line.

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.Text(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Write a plain BLACK message.
If 'line' is true go to new line.

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.Error(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Write a RED error message.
If 'line' is true go to new line.

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.Warning(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Write a YELLOW warning message.
If 'line' is true go to new line.

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.Success(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Write a GREEN success message.
If 'line' is true go to new line.

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.Note(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Write a GRAY note message.
If 'line' is true go to new line.

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.Debug(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Write a CYAN debug message only when is true.
If 'line' is true go to new line.

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.Separator(System.Int32)
member.summary: Write a separation line made by a number of segments "----"

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.NewLine(System.Int32)
member.summary: Write a number of new line

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.MessageVerb(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Write a plain WHITE message, only when is true.
If 'line' is true go to new line.

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.TextVerb(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Write a plain BLACK message, only when is true.
If 'line' is true go to new line.

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.ErrorVerb(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Write a RED error message, only when is true.
If 'line' is true go to new line.

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.WarningVerb(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Write a YELLOW warning message, only when is true.
If 'line' is true go to new line.

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.SuccessVerb(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Write a GREEN success message, only when is true.
If 'line' is true go to new line.

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.NoteVerb(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Write a GRAY note message, only when is true.
If 'line' is true go to new line.

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.DebugVerb(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Write a CYAN debug message, only when is true and is true.
If 'line' is true go to new line.

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.SeparatorVerb(System.Int32)
member.summary: Write a separation line made by a number of segments "----", only when is true

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.NewLineVerb(System.Int32)
member.summary: Write a number of new line, only when is true

member.name: M:UtilityPack.Print.Print.PrintParse(System.Object)
member.summary: Convert the incoming values to be compatible with the terminal
